Description: A person who makes arrangements with an economic entity into a contract to perform work against which a financial reward state.
Title: Job: employee

Description:
A person who works for his own account or risk labor
- in their own business or practice (self employed)
- as a director and major shareholder (DMS)
- in the company or the practice of a member of the family (family helper), or
- like other independent.
Title: Office: independent
